posts.post_content: I believe you folks are forgetting that [Entreat the Angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entreat the Angels) is also in Standard. There is also much more potential for this card in Modern as well. I'm thinking a W/B build with [Godless Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Godless Shrine) and[Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth) (did any of you see the giant spike in the price of that card?). The plan would be to stall for as long as possible to get Lili to ultimate by turn 7, then, if you're lucky, miracle [Entreat the Angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entreat the Angels) for at least 20. a 5/5 in my books any day.

Posted By: godmetal101 (7/7/2012 12:11:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
What have you done to my beautiful, powerful Liliana? She used to tutor me anything my heart desired while keeping my opponent handless, or summon all the dead in a 3 mile radius to do my bidding, truly black. Now she fetches me land... or kills herself to maybe kill something else... or gives me late game mana ramp... I don't know. Maybe that land fetching is better in real life than in theory. each time you have no lands in hand and you don't draw a land, it's basically mana ramp... I really feel biased with this one.  
But one thing is for certain, that artist should have asked someone else for advice on the face, not sexy at all, as Liliana usually looks. Fetching land still doesn't feel black to me, but whatever, I'll give her a try. Shockland make her better I guess.

Posted By: wholelottalove (10/1/2012 7:34:56 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
ironically, Liliana is quite similar to the original garruk here, although they had a duel deck.  
  
That ultimate is a mana accelerator's wet dream. If you can pull that off, you will have NO concern over mana for the rest of the game. sure, you may have to worry about lana destruction, but all X spells suddenly become nukes for you. The +1 helps quite a lot as well, since its a free lana, which can help you out in times of lana drought.  
  
The -3 is also quite nice, but I feel its slightly overcosted, but having it cost -2 would make it too overpowered, too. still, being able to choose if its +x/+x or -x/-x is awesome.  
  
anyways, if you run a black deck and need a black mana acceleration source without using dark ritual, here you go. just make sure to protect her.
posts.html:
ironically, Liliana is quite similar to the original garruk here, although they had a duel deck.

That ultimate is a mana accelerator's wet dream. If you can pull that off, you will have NO concern over mana for the rest of the game. sure, you may have to worry about lana destruction, but all X spells suddenly become nukes for you. The +1 helps quite a lot as well, since its a free lana, which can help you out in times of lana drought.

The -3 is also quite nice, but I feel its slightly overcosted, but having it cost -2 would make it too overpowered, too. still, being able to choose if its +x/+x or -x/-x is awesome.

anyways, if you run a black deck and need a black mana acceleration source without using dark ritual, here you go. just make sure to protect her.
